name: Roaring Moon
flavorText: It is possible that this is the creature listed as Roaring Moon in an expedition journal that still holds many mysteries.

previous.name: Chi-Yu
previous.flavorText: It controls flames burning at over 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit. It casually swims through the sea of lava it creates by melting rock and sand.

next.name: Iron Valiant
next.flavorText: It has some similarities to a mad scientist’s invention covered in a paranormal magazine.
